trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_BUTLER_000_000<tab>Today is the day, my friend─Little Ladies' Day is finally upon us! Have you had the chance to enjoy everything it has to offer?
TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_BUTLER_000_001<tab>All the best things require a little extra help! If you're still willing to pitch in, please speak with one of my staff to see what you can do.

TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_BUTLER_000_002<tab>The Songbirds have added a great deal to the holiday cheer, haven't they? With everything going so splendidly, it makes me wonder what it was I ever had to be anxious about. You should be proud, my friend.
TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_ULALA_100_010<tab>Come to see me dance? In that case, prepare yourself for an experience you'll never forget!
TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_NARUMI_100_011<tab>I've gone through it again and again. May every note I sing be in perfect harmony!
TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_MASHAMHAKARACCA_100_012<tab>Every step I take on this stage has been choreographed to near perfection! If I do say so myself, it'll be something you'll regret missing.
TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_ULALA_000_010<tab>Here for an autograph, I take it? Say no more! The twinkle in your eye tells me all that I need to know!

TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_NARUMI_000_011<tab>Oh, I can't believe no one wants our flyers. It's so frustrating, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! If only there was a strategy we could employ to get passersby to take them by the handful.
TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_MASHAMHAKARACCA_000_012<tab>How are things faring on the streets, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? You look nearly as exhausted as I feel!

TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_ULALA_000_020<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, what do you think of these new outfits? I didn't believe it possible but I continue getting prettier by the day!
TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_NARUMI_000_021<tab>Do you see them, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─all those people coming to see us? Magnificent, isn't it?
TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_MASHAMHAKARACCA_000_022<tab>If it isn't our flyer-distributing hero back from duty! Have you taken a look at all the new additions they've made to our stage?
TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_ULALA_000_030<tab>Do you see all those people clamoring for my attention in the audience? My magical performance has attracted more onlookers than I can count!

TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_NARUMI_000_031<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, have you seen the decorations that have been strung up around our stage? They're nearly as pretty as our new costumes!

TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_MASHAMHAKARACCA_000_032<tab>There's been such a massive turnout and I couldn't be happier. I just wish that they would stop chanting my name! It makes me so nervous I sometimes forget how to breathe!
